Package traffic

Class Car

  • java.lang.Object
    • traffic.Car

  • public class Car
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the object Car and its constructors and methods Car consists of 4 main fields: pos (position), the time of entry (entryTime), the time of entry to the construction zone (conTime), and the time of exit from the highway (endTime).
    Since:
    1.8
    Author:
    Garrison Henkle

      Constructor with a time parameter

      Sets the end flag to true Indicates that the car has left the 25 mile stretch of simulated highway

        Determines whether the car is in the construction zone
        Returns:
